name: Spaceboy - Love and War
description:
The second of three Spaceboy music series with animated cover art, Love and War takes Black Light through a vibrant passageway, towards a battle with a giant. 

The colourful tunnel represents the euphoric feeling of being in love. As with all good things coming to an end, Black Light’s confrontation against the winged giant that resembles Aphrodite statue symbolizes the struggle after the love is gone.

As I was working on this, I felt like the work had to break out of the album cover format in order to convey the sequence effectively. To me the extended middle part is kind of like when we listen to music while going through the album inlay.
